DOC.brief_summary: The study evaluate effect GSK2256294 exposure steady state pulmonary artery systolic pressure ( PASP ) healthy volunteer , hypoxic condition , 7 day dose . It single centre , double blind , randomize , placebo-controlled study conduct approximately 30 healthy volunteer . Subjects screen 30 day . Subject admitted clinical unit Day -1 . Subject dose 7 day unit morning day except dose Days 3 -6 . Dosing Days 3 -6 occur home . Subjects return unit evening Day 6 remain Day 8 . Subjects undergo echocardiography normoxic hypoxic Day 1 pre-dose Day 7 post-dose . Subject follow 28- 32 day discharge . The maximum estimated time subject enrol study 62 day screen visit follow .
DOC.brief_title: To Evaluate Effects GSK2256294 Pulmonary Artery Pressure Healthy Volunteers Under Normoxic Hypoxic Conditions
